name: Flame Within Ice
description:
The game is specially designed for the 2021 Epic MegaJam

Theme:  Running out of space

You play as fire flame creature and you must melt ice creatures with your fire on your way but watch out, the ground is also ice and you are at risk for falling by running out of space.

This is my first game with unreal engine

Gameplay Instructions 

 W,A,S,D to move

Mouse to aim and shoot

Space to jump
